official_title: Congratulating Carlos Boozer, Corey Cogdell, and Matt Emmons for their outstanding achievements in the 2008 Beijing Summer Olympic Games.

summary.text: Honors the accomplishments and Olympic achievements of Carlos Boozer, Corey Cogdell, and Matt Emmons.
